attributes.action: call upon the Speaker of the House to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The actions of the Speaker in allowing the police to invade the House of Commons besmirches the great tradition of Speakers epitomised by Speaker Lenthall.  Speaker Martin by his actions has brought that great office into disrepute.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
